item.title: 美国国会议员要求就华为设备中的台积电芯片给出答案
item.description: 美国众议院中国问题委员会共和党主席周三要求美国商务部和台积电做出答复，因为在中国华为公司生产的设备中发现了台积电生产的芯片。【原文：The Republican chairman of the U.S. House of Representatives Committee on China demanded answers on Wednesday from the Commerce Department and TSMC after a chip made by the Taiwanese company was found in a device made by China's Huawei.】

item.title: 纽约联储称银行通过延长贷款期限掩盖商业地产风险
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周三发布的一份文件称，银行一直在调整商业房地产抵押贷款的条款，以掩盖损失，在推迟清算日的同时，也增加了更广泛的金融体系的风险。【原文：Banks have been tweaking the terms of commercial real estate mortgages to obscure losses, and in delaying the day of reckoning, are increasing risks to the broader financial system, a paper released Wednesday by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York said.】

item.title: 路透社活动-尽管对中国竞争对手征收关税，美国汽车制造商仍被敦促创新
item.description: 美国汽车制造商及其供应商的领导人本周在底特律举行的路透社活动上表示，在对中国竞争对手征收关税带来一些短期缓解的同时，汽车行业不能沾沾自喜。【原文：Leaders from American automakers and their suppliers said at a Reuters event in Detroit this week that the industry cannot afford complacency while tariffs on Chinese competitors provide some short-term relief.】

item.title: 美联储调查显示，最近几周美国经济活动变化不大
item.description: 9 月至 10 月初，美国经济活动变化不大，但企业招聘人数有所增加，延续了近期的趋势，这增强了人们对美联储将在两周内选择将借贷成本下调 25 个基点的预期。【原文：U.S. economic activity was little changed from September through early October while firms saw an uptick in hiring, continuing recent trends that have reinforced expectations the Federal Reserve will opt for a smaller 25-basis-point reduction in borrowing costs in two weeks.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，摩根大通希望恢复液化天然气实物交易
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，摩根大通正在就时隔十多年后恢复液化天然气（LNG）实物交易进行谈判。【原文：JPMorgan Chase is in talks to resume trading physical liquefied natural gas (LNG) after more than a decade, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 电信集团起诉阻止美国联邦贸易委员会的 "点击取消 "规则
item.description: 一个代表有线电视和互联网供应商的行业组织周三与另外两家公司一起提起诉讼，要求阻止美国联邦贸易委员会的一项规定，该规定要求各公司提供简单的取消订阅机制。【原文：An industry group representing cable and internet providers sued along with two others on Wednesday to block a U.S. Federal Trade Commission rule that requires companies to offer simple cancellation mechanisms for subscriptions.】

item.title: 桥水称美联储独立性是美国大选的首要关注点
item.description: 据路透社查阅，对冲基金桥水联合公司（Bridgewater Associates）在周二发给客户的一份评论中称，美联储的独立性可能是美国总统大选中的首要问题。【原文：Hedge fund Bridgewater Associates said the Federal Reserve independence is probably a top issue in the U.S. presidential election, according to a commentary sent to clients on Tuesday and reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 纽约调查 Capital One-Discover 合并是否违反反垄断法
item.description: 纽约州总检察长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯（Letitia James）正在调查 Capital One 收购 Discover Financial Services 的提议是否违反了该州的反垄断法。【原文：New York Attorney General Letitia James is investigating whether Capital One's proposed takeover of Discover Financial Services violates the state's antitrust law.】

item.title: 初创公司 Hugging Face 旨在通过开源产品削减人工智能成本
item.description: 抱抱脸公司周三表示，它将与亚马逊公司、Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司和其他公司共同发布一款新的开源软件产品，旨在降低构建聊天机器人和其他人工智能系统的成本。【原文：Hugging Face on Wednesday said it is releasing a new open-source software offering with Amazon.com , Alphabet's Google and others aimed at lowering the costs for building chatbots and other AI systems.】

item.title: 全球需求疲软，米其林季度销售额不及预期
item.description: 法国轮胎制造商米其林公司周三表示，由于需求疲软，该公司第三季度销售额下降了 4.2%，略低于市场预期。【原文：Michelin's third-quarter sales dropped by 4.2%, slightly missing market expectations due to weaker demand, the French tyre maker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 微软称中国影响力行动瞄准美国下选区选举
item.description: 据微软公司周三发布的最新研究报告称，一支由中国人控制的社交媒体机器人大军正试图影响阿拉巴马州、得克萨斯州和田纳西州的选民，同时诋毁美国佛罗里达州参议员马可-卢比奥（Marco Rubio）。【原文：An army of Chinese-controlled social media bots is attempting to influence voters in Alabama, Texas and Tennessee, while denigrating U.S. Senator Marco Rubio of Florida, according to new research published on Wednesday by Microsoft .】

item.title: 古驰（Gucci）销售额下滑，Kering 对 2024 年年度营业利润发出警告
item.description: 法国奢侈品集团开云集团（Kering）周三警告称，由于中国市场需求疲软加深了其主要品牌古驰（Gucci）的困境，该集团第三季度销售额降幅超过预期，全年营业收入将减少近一半。【原文：French luxury goods group Kering warned on Wednesday its full-year operating income would almost halve after reporting a larger-than-expected drop in third quarter sales, as weak demand in China deepened the struggles of its main label Gucci.】

item.title: 贝克休斯预计利润率将因强劲的订单积压而上升
item.description: 贝克休斯周三预测，在第三季度利润超过华尔街预期后，第四季度和明年的税前利润率将继续增长。【原文：Baker Hughes on Wednesday forecast continued pretax margin gains in the fourth quarter and next year after beating Wall Street estimates for its third-quarter profit.】

item.title: 壳牌挫败尼日利亚吸引投资的努力
item.description: 分析人士说，尼日利亚本周决定阻止壳牌公司出售其价值 24 亿美元的陆上资产，这向投资者发出了一个消极信号，即尼日利亚急需加强其至关重要的石油行业。【原文：Nigeria's decision this week to block Shell's $2.4 billion sale of its onshore assets has sent a negative signal to investors the country urgently needs to strengthen its all-important oil sector, analysts said.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，苹果大幅削减 Vision Pro 的产量
item.description: 据 Information 周三援引参与制造 Vision Pro 部件的人士的话报道，苹果公司自初夏以来大幅缩减了 Vision Pro 的生产规模，并可能在年底前停止生产现有版本的混合现实头盔。【原文：Apple has sharply scaled back its Vision Pro production since early summer and could stop making the existing version of the mixed reality headset by year-end, the Information reported on Wednesday, citing people involved in building its components.】

item.title: Seven & i 旨在说服投资者相信其能够独立完成任务
item.description: 日本 Seven & i 公司在宣布了一项旨在抵御 470 亿美元收购要约的全面分拆计划后，将于周四向股东发表讲话，希望说服他们相信公司能够依靠自身力量实现长期增长。【原文：Japan's Seven & i will be looking to convince shareholders it can deliver long-term growth on its own when it speaks to them on Thursday, after announcing a sweeping break-up plan designed to ward off a $47 billion takeover offer.】

item.title: 独家：港口能源公司加入北海生产商在增税前的撤退行列
item.description: 消息人士称，英国北海顶级生产商海港能源公司（Harbour Energy）希望出售在北海油田的股份，并正在重启在美国上市的计划。【原文：Top British North Sea producer Harbour Energy wants to sell stakes in North Sea oilfields and is reviving plans for a U.S. listing, sources said, as more firms scale back investments ahead of new tax increases on the sector.】

item.title: 美国监管机构责令高盛和苹果公司就消费者投诉支付 8,900 万美元
item.description: 美国消费者金融保护局（U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）周三宣布，企业巨头高盛（Goldman Sachs）和苹果公司将为其联合信用卡业务中违反消费者保护法的行为支付 8900 万美元。【原文：Corporate giants Goldman Sachs and Apple will pay $89 million for violations of consumer protection laws in their joint credit card business, the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau announced Wednesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命内部人士 Michelle Herrick 为商业地产部主管
item.description: 美国银行业巨头摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase）周三任命内部人士米歇尔-赫里克（Michelle Herrick）为商业地产业务主管，接替艾尔-布鲁克斯（Al Brooks），1 月起生效。【原文：U.S. banking giant JPMorgan Chase on Wednesday named insider Michelle Herrick as its head of commercial real estate business, effective January, succeeding Al Brooks.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）财政主管称美国债务可持续，但现在是整顿的时候了
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund, 简称 "基金组织"）财政主管周三表示，尽管美国经济稳步增长，但美国的债务路径仍然是可持续的，因为政策制定者有很多选择来控制债务，而且美国拥有令人羡慕的强劲增长和宽松的金融条件。【原文：The U.S. debt path is still sustainable despite steady growth because policymakers have many options to bring debt under control and have an enviable combination of strong growth and easing financial conditions, the International Monetary Fund's fiscal chief said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 世界银行表示到 2030 年将把农业承诺增加一倍，达到每年 90 亿美元
item.description: 世界银行行长周三宣布，到 2030 年，世界银行对农业融资和企业投资的承诺将翻一番，达到每年 90 亿美元。【原文：The World Bank will double its commitment for investments in agricultural financing and businesses to $9 billion a year by 2030, the lender's president announced on Wednesday.】

item.title: Stellantis 将推出配备 Factorial 固态电池的电动车队
item.description: 汽车制造商 Stellantis 和美国初创公司 Factorial 周三表示，两家公司将在 2026 年前推出装有美国初创公司 Factorial 生产的固态电池的示范车队。【原文：Carmaker Stellantis will launch by 2026 a demonstration fleet of vehicles fitted with solid-state batteries from U.S. startup Factorial, the two companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国 9 月成屋销售跌至 14 年低点
item.description: 9 月份，美国现房销售量降至 14 年来的最低点，这可能是因为潜在购房者仍在等待较低的抵押贷款利率，而房价却居高不下。【原文：U.S. existing home sales dropped to a 14-year low in September, likely as prospective buyers held out for lower mortgage rates, with house prices remaining elevated.】

item.title: 加拿大央行下调利率，称赞低通胀的 "好消息
item.description: (发布公告）【原文：(Releads with announcement)】

item.title: 壳牌将收购发电厂运营商 RISEC Holdings
item.description: 壳牌集团（Shell plc）周三表示，其旗下的壳牌北美能源公司（SENA）已同意收购罗得岛州一座 609 兆瓦燃气电厂的所有者 RISEC Holdings。【原文：Shell plc said on Wednesday its unit, Shell Energy North America (SENA), has agreed to acquire RISEC Holdings, the owner of a 609-megawatt gas power plant in Rhode Island.】

item.title: 沃伦-巴菲特表示不会为投资产品或候选人背书
item.description: 根据企业集团伯克希尔-哈撒韦（Berkshire Hathaway）网站上的一份声明，沃伦-巴菲特将不会为投资产品或政治候选人背书，这显然是为了防止有人试图利用他的声誉。【原文：Warren Buffett will not endorse investment products or political candidates, according to a statement on conglomerate Berkshire Hathaway's website, in an apparent effort to ward off people trying to capitalize on his reputation.】

item.title: 消息人士称，台积电在华为产品中发现芯片后停止向客户供应芯片
item.description: 据一位熟悉情况的台湾官员称，台湾半导体制造股份有限公司在发现供应给客户的一款芯片最终被用于华为产品后，已暂停向该客户发货。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co has suspended shipments to a customer after it discovered that one of its chips supplied to the client ended up in a Huawei product, according to a Taiwan official familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 默克公司以高达 13 亿美元的价格收购癌症疗法开发商 Modifi 生物科学公司
item.description: 默克公司以高达 13 亿美元的价格收购了 Modifi 生物科学公司，获得了其实验性癌症疗法的使用权，这家私营生物技术公司于周三表示。【原文：Merck has acquired Modifi Biosciences for as much as $1.3 billion, gaining access to its experimental cancer therapies, the privately held biotech firm said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，巴西 Azul 公司正在权衡筹集新资本的方案，交易有望达成
item.description: 三位接近讨论的消息人士告诉路透社，巴西 Azul 航空公司正在与多方谈判，希望通过债务融资筹集约 4 亿美元的新资金，协议最快可能在本周达成。【原文：Brazilian airline Azul is in talks with multiple parties to raise about $400 million in fresh capital via debt financing and an agreement may come as soon as this week, three sources close to the discussions told Reuters.】

item.title: 北方信托季度利润因资产管理费增加而大幅增长
item.description: 北方信托公司（Northern Trust）周三报告称，由于服务和管理客户资产的费用收入增加，该公司第三季度利润增长了 42%，使得这家资产和财富管理公司的股价在盘前交易中上涨了 4.4%。【原文：Northern Trust reported a 42% rise in third-quarter profit on Wednesday, on a higher fee income from servicing and managing client assets, sending the asset and wealth manager's shares up 4.4% in trading before the bell.】
